0.text: Innate - Pyromania: Annie gains a stack of Pyromania whenever she casts an ability, up to a maximum of 4, at which she gains Energized.

1.text: Energized: When Annie succeeds in her next cast damaging ability, she consumes all Pyromania stacks and  stuns enemies hit for 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75 (based on level) seconds.

2.text: Annie loses Energized and all Pyromania stacks upon death.

0.text: Active: Annie hurls a fireball at the target enemy that deals magic damage.

1.text: If this attack kills the target, half the cooldown is  reduced and the  mana cost is refunded.

0.text: Active: Annie casts a cone of fire in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
Active: Annie grants herself or the target allied  champion and  Tibbers a  shield for 3 seconds and 20% − 50% (based on level)  bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.

1.text: While Molten Shield is active, enemies who  basic attack the target are dealt magic damage.

0.text: Active: Annie summons  Tibbers to the target location in a burst of flame, dealing magic damage to enemies near him. Summon: Tibbers can be recast at any time while  Tibbers is alive.

1.text: Tibbers then remains on the field as a controllable  pet for up to 45 seconds.

2.text: Recast: Annie directs  Tibbers to the target location.

3.text: Summon: Tibber's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

1.concerningText: Active: Annie hurls a fireball at the target enemy that deals magic damage.

2.concerningText: Active: Annie casts a cone of fire in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

3.concerningText: Active: Annie grants herself or the target allied  champion and  Tibbers a  shield for 3 seconds and 20% − 50% (based on level)  bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.
While Molten Shield is active, enemies who  basic attack the target are dealt magic damage.

4.concerningText: Active: Annie summons  Tibbers to the target location in a burst of flame, dealing magic damage to enemies near him. Summon: Tibbers can be recast at any time while  Tibbers is alive.

0.concerningText: Active: Annie hurls a fireball at the target enemy that deals magic damage.
Active: Annie casts a cone of fire in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
Active: Annie grants herself or the target allied  champion and  Tibbers a  shield for 3 seconds and 20% − 50% (based on level)  bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.

1.concerningText: While Molten Shield is active, enemies who  basic attack the target are dealt magic damage.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and launches bolts at up to 3 enemies near them, dealing them the same damage, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and launches bolts at up to 3 enemies near them, dealing them the same damage, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
